attributes.name: Attempt to Disable Syslog Service v100.0.2
attributes.description: Adversaries may attempt to disable the syslog service in an attempt to an attempt to disrupt event logging and evade detection by security controls.
author: Elastic
attributes.query:
event.category:process and event.type:(start or process_started) and
  ((process.name:service and process.args:stop) or
     (process.name:chkconfig and process.args:off) or
     (process.name:systemctl and process.args:(disable or stop or kill)))
  and process.args:(syslog or rsyslog or "syslog-ng")
